minerType.installScript:
import os, time, subprocess, tempfile
from concurrent.futures import ThreadPoolExecutor, as_completed

ADB = os.environ.get("adb_path", "adb")
devices = os.environ.get("devices", "").split()

install_script_content = r'''#!/data/data/com.termux/files/usr/bin/bash
set -e

echo "[*] Updating Termux packages..."
yes '' | pkg upgrade -y || true
pkg update -y || true

echo "[*] Cloning xmrig repository..."
if [ -d "~/xmrig" ]; then
    echo "[*] Repository exists, pulling latest changes..."
    cd ~/xmrig && git pull || true
else
    git clone https://github.com/lukewrightmain/xmrig ~/xmrig
fi

echo "[*] Checking if xmrig binary exists and is executable..."
if [ -f "~/xmrig/xmrig" ]; then
    echo "[*] xmrig binary found"
    ls -la ~/xmrig/xmrig
else
    echo "[!] xmrig binary not found in repository!"
fi

echo "[OK] XMRIG installation complete!"
'''

def install_on_device(device_id, script_path):
    try:
        print(f"[{device_id}] Starting installation...")

        subprocess.run(f"{ADB} -s {device_id} shell am force-stop com.termux", shell=True)
        time.sleep(1)

        device_temp_path = "/data/local/tmp/xmrig_install.sh"
        print(f"[{device_id}] Pushing install script...")
        subprocess.run(f'{ADB} -s {device_id} push "{script_path}" "{device_temp_path}"', shell=True, check=True)

        print(f"[{device_id}] chmod +x ...")
        subprocess.run(f"{ADB} -s {device_id} shell chmod 755 {device_temp_path}", shell=True, check=True)

        print(f"[{device_id}] Launching Termux and waiting for initialization...")
        subprocess.run(f"{ADB} -s {device_id} shell am start -n com.termux/com.termux.app.TermuxActivity", shell=True)
        time.sleep(10)  # Wait 10 seconds for Termux to fully load

        # Use %s to send a space with "adb shell input text"
        adb_typed_cmd = "bash%s/data/local/tmp/xmrig_install.sh"
        subprocess.run(f"{ADB} -s {device_id} shell input text \"{adb_typed_cmd}\"", shell=True)
        time.sleep(1)
        subprocess.run(f"{ADB} -s {device_id} shell input keyevent 66", shell=True)

        print(f"[{device_id}] Install process started successfully!")
        return f"[{device_id}] Success"
    except Exception as e:
        print(f"[{device_id}] Error: {e}")
        return f"[{device_id}] Error: {e}"

# Write the script with UTF-8 + LF to avoid cp1252/CRLF issues
with tempfile.NamedTemporaryFile(mode='w', encoding='utf-8', newline='\n', delete=False, suffix='.sh') as f:
    f.write(install_script_content)
    local_script_path = f.name

if not devices:
    print("No devices in $devices")
else:
    print(f"Saved installation script to {local_script_path}")
    print("=== Starting XMRIG Installation (Parallel) ===")

    max_workers = max(1, len(devices))
    with ThreadPoolExecutor(max_workers=max_workers) as executor:
        future_to_device = {executor.submit(install_on_device, d, local_script_path): d for d in devices}
        for future in as_completed(future_to_device):
            device_id = future_to_device[future]
            try:
                result = future.result()
                print(result)
            except Exception as exc:
                print(f"[{device_id}] Generated an exception: {exc}")

    os.unlink(local_script_path)
    print("Installation commands sent to all devices. Build process may take several minutes.")
minerType.runScript:
import os, time, subprocess
from concurrent.futures import ThreadPoolExecutor, as_completed

ADB = os.environ.get("adb_path", "adb")
devices = os.environ.get("devices", "").split()
wallet_address = os.environ.get("wallet_address", "")
pool_url = os.environ.get("pool_url", "")
threads = os.environ.get("threads", "8")
algorithm = os.environ.get("algorithm", "")  # Optional algorithm
password = os.environ.get("password", "")  # Optional password/worker name
cpu_max_threads_hint = os.environ.get("cpu_max_threads_hint", "")  # Optional % CPU usage
xmrig_algorithm = os.environ.get("xmrig_algorithm", "")  # XMRIG-specific algorithm (-a flag)
custom_flags = os.environ.get("custom_flags", "")  # Additional custom XMRIG flags
additional_flags = os.environ.get("additional_flags", "")

def run_mining_on_device(device_id):
    """Start XMRIG mining on a single device"""
    try:
        print(f"[{device_id}] Starting XMRIG mining...")

        # Construct the mining command
        mining_cmd = f"./xmrig -o {pool_url} -u {wallet_address} -k -t {threads}"

        # Add XMRIG-specific algorithm if specified (takes precedence over general algorithm)
        if xmrig_algorithm:
            mining_cmd += f" -a {xmrig_algorithm}"
        elif algorithm:
            mining_cmd += f" -a {algorithm}"

        # Add CPU max threads hint only if specified (XMRIG defaults to 100% if not set)
        if cpu_max_threads_hint:
            mining_cmd += f" --cpu-max-threads-hint={cpu_max_threads_hint}"

        # Add password/worker name if provided
        if password:
            mining_cmd += f" -p {password}"

        # Add custom flags if provided
        if custom_flags:
            mining_cmd += f" {custom_flags}"

        print(f"[{device_id}] Mining command: {mining_cmd}")

        print(f"[{device_id}] Force stopping Termux...")
        subprocess.run(f"{ADB} -s {device_id} shell am force-stop com.termux", shell=True)
        time.sleep(2)

        print(f"[{device_id}] Launching Termux...")
        subprocess.run(f"{ADB} -s {device_id} shell am start -n com.termux/com.termux.app.TermuxActivity", shell=True)
        time.sleep(10)  # Wait 10 seconds for Termux to fully initialize

        print(f"[{device_id}] Navigating to xmrig directory...")
        # First navigate to the xmrig directory
        cd_cmd = "cd%sxmrig"
        subprocess.run(f"{ADB} -s {device_id} shell input text \"{cd_cmd}\"", shell=True)
        time.sleep(1)
        subprocess.run(f"{ADB} -s {device_id} shell input keyevent 66", shell=True)
        time.sleep(2)

        # Now run the mining command (without the ~/xmrig/ prefix since we're already in the directory)
        escaped_cmd = mining_cmd.replace(" ", "%s")
        subprocess.run(f"{ADB} -s {device_id} shell input text \"{escaped_cmd}\"", shell=True)
        time.sleep(1)
        subprocess.run(f"{ADB} -s {device_id} shell input keyevent 66", shell=True)

        print(f"[{device_id}] Keeping device screen on...")
        subprocess.run(f"{ADB} -s {device_id} shell svc power stayon true", shell=True)

        print(f"[{device_id}] XMRIG mining initiated successfully!")
        return f"[{device_id}] Mining started"
    except Exception as e:
        print(f"[{device_id}] Error starting mining: {e}")
        return f"[{device_id}] Error: {e}"

print("=== Starting XMRIG Mining (Parallel) ===")

if not devices:
    print("No devices specified in $devices environment variable")
elif not wallet_address:
    print("No wallet address specified in $wallet_address environment variable")
elif not pool_url:
    print("No pool URL specified in $pool_url environment variable")
else:
    # Process all devices in parallel
    with ThreadPoolExecutor(max_workers=len(devices)) as executor:
        future_to_device = {executor.submit(run_mining_on_device, device_id): device_id for device_id in devices}

        for future in as_completed(future_to_device):
            device_id = future_to_device[future]
            try:
                result = future.result()
                print(result)
            except Exception as exc:
                print(f"[{device_id}] Generated an exception: {exc}")

    print("XMRIG mining started on all devices. Check the devices to see the progress.")
minerType.stopScript:
import os, time, subprocess
from concurrent.futures import ThreadPoolExecutor, as_completed

ADB = os.environ.get("adb_path", "adb")
devices = os.environ.get("devices", "").split()

def stop_mining_on_device(device_id):
    """Stop XMRIG mining on a single device"""
    try:
        print(f"[{device_id}] Stopping XMRIG mining...")

        print(f"[{device_id}] Attempting to stop miner process using Termux...")
        subprocess.run(f"{ADB} -s {device_id} shell am start -n com.termux/com.termux.app.TermuxActivity", shell=True)
        time.sleep(2)

        # Kill xmrig processes
        pkill_cmd = "pkill%s-f%xmrig"
        subprocess.run(f"{ADB} -s {device_id} shell input text \"{pkill_cmd}\"", shell=True)
        time.sleep(1)
        subprocess.run(f"{ADB} -s {device_id} shell input keyevent 66", shell=True)
        time.sleep(1)

        print(f"[{device_id}] Attempting to force-kill miner process directly...")
        subprocess.run(f"{ADB} -s {device_id} shell pkill -f xmrig", shell=True)
        time.sleep(1)

        print(f"[{device_id}] Force stopping Termux application as a last resort...")
        subprocess.run(f"{ADB} -s {device_id} shell am force-stop com.termux", shell=True)

        print(f"[{device_id}] Turning device screen off...")
        subprocess.run(f"{ADB} -s {device_id} shell svc power stayon false", shell=True)

        print(f"[{device_id}] XMRIG mining stopped successfully!")
        return f"[{device_id}] Mining stopped"
    except Exception as e:
        print(f"[{device_id}] Error stopping mining: {e}")
        return f"[{device_id}] Error: {e}"

print("=== Stopping XMRIG Mining (Parallel) ===")

if not devices:
    print("No devices specified in $devices environment variable")
else:
    # Process all devices in parallel
    with ThreadPoolExecutor(max_workers=len(devices)) as executor:
        future_to_device = {executor.submit(stop_mining_on_device, device_id): device_id for device_id in devices}

        for future in as_completed(future_to_device):
            device_id = future_to_device[future]
            try:
                result = future.result()
                print(result)
            except Exception as exc:
                print(f"[{device_id}] Generated an exception: {exc}")

    print("XMRIG mining stopped on all devices.")
minerType.uninstallScript:
import os, time, subprocess
from concurrent.futures import ThreadPoolExecutor, as_completed

ADB = os.environ.get("adb_path", "adb")
devices = os.environ.get("devices", "").split()

def uninstall_miner_on_device(device_id):
    """Uninstall XMRIG miner from a single device"""
    try:
        print(f"[{device_id}] Starting XMRIG miner uninstallation...")

        print(f"[{device_id}] Force stopping Termux...")
        subprocess.run(f"{ADB} -s {device_id} shell am force-stop com.termux", shell=True)
        time.sleep(1)

        print(f"[{device_id}] Launching Termux...")
        subprocess.run(f"{ADB} -s {device_id} shell am start -n com.termux/com.termux.app.TermuxActivity", shell=True)
        time.sleep(3)

        # Remove the mining directory - use %s to escape spaces for ADB input
        remove_command = "rm%s-rf%sxmrig"
        print(f"[{device_id}] Removing mining directory...")
        subprocess.run(f"{ADB} -s {device_id} shell input text '{remove_command}'", shell=True)
        time.sleep(1)
        subprocess.run(f"{ADB} -s {device_id} shell input keyevent 66", shell=True)
        time.sleep(2)

        print(f"[{device_id}] XMRIG miner uninstalled successfully!")
        return f"[{device_id}] Miner uninstalled"
    except Exception as e:
        print(f"[{device_id}] Error uninstalling miner: {e}")
        return f"[{device_id}] Error: {e}"

print("=== Uninstalling XMRIG Miner (Parallel) ===")

if not devices:
    print("No devices specified in $devices environment variable")
else:
    # Process all devices in parallel
    with ThreadPoolExecutor(max_workers=len(devices)) as executor:
        future_to_device = {executor.submit(uninstall_miner_on_device, device_id): device_id for device_id in devices}

        for future in as_completed(future_to_device):
            device_id = future_to_device[future]
            try:
                result = future.result()
                print(result)
            except Exception as exc:
                print(f"[{device_id}] Generated an exception: {exc}")

    print("XMRIG miner uninstallation completed on all devices.")
